title: You die and appear before God. You have 10 seconds.
body:
You die and appear before God. You have 10 seconds and 2 options.

1. Say nothing, and receive your judgement.

2. Ask 1 question. You can ask any question and God will give you the 100% accurate answer. You will be returned to your body and come back to life on Earth with full memory of what God's answer was.

What do you do
